#summary How to download the latest version

= How To Download Tcases =

Due to a change in the Google Code project hosting service, you can no longer download the latest version of Tcases from this site.

Instead, to get the command line version of Tcases, download the Tcases binary distribution file from the Maven Central Repository, using the following procedure.

  # Visit the [http://search.maven.org/#search%7Cga%7C1%7Ctcases-shell Central Repository search page].

  # Search for "tcases-shell".

  # Download the most recent version for the artifact named "tcases-shell". You can choose to download this either as a ZIP file or a compressed tar file (tar.gz)
